About

Vision

To be the leader of food safety, cleaning and hygiene service provider in Republic of Maldives

Mission

CHEMLAB supplies and provide quality products and equipments with prompt efficent service to all our customers. Our customers are our key assets and assure to always be sensitive and responsive.

With our in-house laboratory service and technical service we keep monitoring and assuring the quality and accuracy of the service provided.

Each member of our staff is acknowledged as a valuble asset and we are committed to growth and stability. thus providing standards of excellence that will ensure CHEMLAB's expansion and success for everyone involved
